title: Meltwater Turns Iceberg A-23A Blue
description: After a four-decade run, the massive, waterlogged berg is leaking meltwater and on the verge of disintegrating.
content: After a four-decade run, the massive, waterlogged berg is leaking meltwater and on the verge of disintegrating.
